replies.author: William_Shi
replies.txt_content:
我可以基于编程开发角度仔细解读一下
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// This doesn't make any sense!


不可思议的错误

Time: 20-6-9 下午9:00
Description: Exception in server tick loop



服务器基础的循环出错，包括事件监听、任务调度等各种循环


java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.HashMap$HashIterator.nextNode(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.HashMap$KeyIterator.next(Unknown Source)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.entity.CraftPlayer.injectScaledMaxHealth(CraftPlayer.java:1306)
        at net.minecraft.entity.EntityTrackerEntry.func_111190_b(EntityTrackerEntry.java:357)
        at net.minecraft.entity.EntityTrackerEntry.func_73122_a(EntityTrackerEntry.java:256)
        at net.minecraft.entity.EntityTracker.func_72788_a(EntityTracker.java:276)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:975)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:459)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:806)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:665)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


什么意思？concurrent包见过吗？cowa，concurrenthashmap？这个意思是 高并发出错
听不懂？两段代码（姑且这么说），同时操作了同一个数据，导致冲突
（有一道题目是1+1=？，A在黑板上写1但是B同时想写2，类似这种）


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


之后给了服务器一堆基础信息
